PerfectNetExp.abs: sublunar 月下的sublunary 月下的submachine gun 冲锋枪
...续领域中的事件、行为、结构和过程提供的解释，也就是，在人类作为类而存在的有限的——保罗?韦纳称为的“尘世的（sublunary）”——世界中“特定的时间和地点”。

list.abs: transcendental motives for sublunary actions ; fleeting sublunary pleasures an angelic being that treads this terrestrial ball .现世行为的超凡动机；短暂的世俗之乐；在现世的舞台上近乎天使般的人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'terrestrial'): from modern Latin sublunaris

means.word_mean: 1. situated between the earth and the moon

sentences.sentence: "the nearest to an angelic being that treads this terrestrial ball"

auth_sentence.content: Climbing higher...and cutting himself off...from all intercourse with the sublunary world.
